# Gradle files
.gradle/
build/

# Local configuration file (SDK path, etc)
local.properties

# IDE specific folders
.idea/
*.iml

# Android Studio captures
captures/

# Mac system files
.DS_Store

# Log files
*.log

# Generated files
*.apk
*.ap_

# Keystore files (in case youâ€™re signing)
*.jks

# Kotlin build
.kotlinc/

# Others
*.class
